solution_line_template: Since 1 hour is equal to 60 minutes, then {minutes_run} minutes is equal to {minutes_run}/{minutes_per_hour} = <<{minutes_run}/{minutes_per_hour}={hours_run}>>{hours_run} hours.
Then, the speed in kilometers per hour is {distance_km} km/{hours_run} hour = {speed_km_per_hour} kilometers per hour.
